能场ENB Energy Field ENB
EnergyBlock为用户开发了基于自身生态的去中心化钱包，为用户资产的存储、通兑、流转提供了载体，以人性化、易操作的美观界面为用户带来最舒适的体验。 EnergyBlock has developed a decentralized wallet based on its own ecosystem for users, which provides a carrier for the storage, exchange and circulation of user assets. The user-friendly and easy-to-operate aesthetic interface provides users with the most comfortable experience.
